html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-03352022-04-05,  ,  ,  ,  GAC, 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add nine (9) individuals to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs; (2) prohibit individuals or entities in Canada from providing insurance, reinsurance, and underwriting services related to Russian aircraft, and aviation and aerospace products.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0074 Publication Date: 2022-04-27
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add nine (9) individuals to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs; (2) prohibit individuals or entities in Canada from providing insurance, reinsurance, and underwriting services related to Russian aircraft, and aviation and aerospace products.
